job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Sr. Software Engineer Job DescriptionThe Sr. Software Engineer position is accountable to deliver highest quality software for UHG/Optum next generation web-based Provider portals, applications, and solutions.  As an integral member of the technology delivery team, the Sr. Software Engineer will be a primary contributor in designing, coding, testing, debugging, documenting and supporting software applications consistent with established specifications and business requirements to deliver business value. The ideal candidate has 4+ years full-stack software engineering experience and proficiency in Microservices Architecture. Required Skills:Â·         4+ years of experience with Java (Must have Java 8 or higher)Â·         2+ years of Experience in Spring Boot or Spring MVCÂ·         2+ years of Experience in Developing Rest ServicesÂ·         2+ years of experience with GitÂ·         2+years of experience in KafkaÂ·         1+ years of experience with Dependency Injection frameworkÂ·         3+ years of experience in MicroservicesÂ·         5+ years of software development experience.Â·         3+ years of experience with agile development methodologies.Â·         1+ years of experience with Test-Driven Development using automated testing frameworksÂ·         3+ years of experience ensuring your code builds and deploys properly through Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment processes built in Jenkins.Â·        Hadoop,Security,spring,Docker,management,architecture,Debugging,Agile,Scrum,ant,Design,Automation,Azure,Adaptability,Engineering,Shipping,Testing, Communication, SAN, Kubernetes, Business,Java,Data Structures,React
